results.title: Novel pharmacological approaches in abdominal aortic aneurysm
results.text_hl: It should be noted, however, that although cohort studies and case-control studies support the ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to ameliorate @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ progression and @<m>DISEASE_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000783 @@@aneurysm@@@-related events, randomised controlled trials are needed to state this assumption more clearly.
